This document outlines the assignment requirements, deliverables, and master checklist for your group white paper project.

## Core Requirements

- **Team project** (2-3 members)
- **3,000–4,000 words**
- **10-12 academic citations**
- **One original survey** (N=100 goal)
- **Two Research Questions (RQs)** and/or **Hypotheses (RHs)**
- All data analyzed in RStudio
- At least two data visualizations created in R
- Written in Quarto (`.qmd`)
- Professional journalistic style

## Final Deliverables

- **GitHub:** Private repository with all project files
- **Blackboard:** Final submission link (if required by your instructor)
